examples: the general contraction of the industry did further damage to morale

definitions.definition: the process in which a muscle becomes or is made shorter and tighter.
examples: neurons control the contraction of muscles

definitions.definition: a shortening of the uterine muscles occurring at intervals before and during childbirth.
examples: labor pains, labor; cramps my contractions started at midnight

definitions.definition: a word or group of words resulting from shortening an original form.
examples: “goodbye” is a contraction of “God be with you.”
synonyms: diminutive "“goodbye” is a contraction of “God be with you”"

definitions.definition: the process of shortening a word by combination or elision.
